arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EBS Snapshot.

dataEncryptionKeyId.description: The data encryption key identifier for the snapshot.

description.description: The description string for the import snapshot task.

diskContainer.description: Information about the disk container. Detailed below.

encrypted.description: Specifies whether the destination snapshot of the imported image should be encrypted. The default KMS key for EBS is used unless you specify a non-default KMS key using KmsKeyId.

kmsKeyId.description: An identifier for the symmetric KMS key to use when creating the encrypted snapshot. This parameter is only required if you want to use a non-default KMS key; if this parameter is not specified, the default KMS key for EBS is used. If a KmsKeyId is specified, the Encrypted flag must also be set.

ownerAlias.description: Value from an Amazon-maintained list (`amazon`, `aws-marketplace`, `microsoft`) of snapshot owners.

ownerId.description: The AWS account ID of the EBS snapshot owner.

permanentRestore.description: Indicates whether to permanently restore an archived snapshot.

roleName.description: The name of the IAM Role the VM Import/Export service will assume. This role needs certain permissions. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vm-import/latest/userguide/vmie_prereqs.html#vmimport-role. Default: `vmimport`

storageTier.description: The name of the storage tier. Valid values are `archive` and `standard`. Default value is `standard`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the snapshot.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

temporaryRestoreDays.description: Specifies the number of days for which to temporarily restore an archived snapshot. Required for temporary restores only. The snapshot will be automatically re-archived after this period.

volumeSize.description: The size of the drive in GiBs.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering SnapshotImport resources.
